info.title: Oxide Sled Agent API
info.description: API for interacting with individual sleds

post.summary: Take a snapshot of a disk that is attached to an instance

put.summary: Create a mapping from a virtual NIC to a physical host

delete.summary: Delete a mapping from a virtual NIC to a physical host

ByteCount.description:
A count of bytes, typically used either for memory or storage capacity

The maximum supported byte count is [`i64::MAX`].  This makes it somewhat inconvenient to define constructors: a u32 constructor can be infallible, but an i64 constructor can fail (if the value is negative) and a u64 constructor can fail (if the value is larger than i64::MAX).  We provide all of these for consumers' convenience.

DatasetEnsureBody.description:
Used to request a new dataset kind exists within a zpool.

Many dataset types are associated with services that will be instantiated when the dataset is detected.

DatasetKind.description: The type of a dataset, and an auxiliary information necessary to successfully launch a zone managing the associated data.

all_addresses.description: The addresses of all nodes within the cluster.

DiskEnsureBody.description: Sent from to a sled agent to establish the runtime state of a Disk

initial_runtime.description: Last runtime state of the Disk known to Nexus (used if the agent has never seen this Disk before).

target.description: requested runtime state of the Disk

DiskRuntimeState.description: Runtime state of the Disk, which includes its attach state and some minimal metadata

DiskState.description: State of a Disk (primarily: attached or not)

oneOf.description: Disk is being initialized
Disk is ready but detached from any Instance
Disk is ready to receive blocks from an external source
Disk is importing blocks from a URL
Disk is importing blocks from bulk writes
Disk is being finalized to state Detached
Disk is undergoing maintenance
Disk is being attached to the given Instance
Disk is attached to the given Instance
Disk is being detached from the given Instance
Disk has been destroyed
Disk is unavailable

DiskStateRequested.description: Used to request a Disk state change

Generation.description: Generation numbers stored in the database, used for optimistic concurrency control

HostIdentifier.description: A `HostIdentifier` represents either an IP host or network (v4 or v6), or an entire VPC (identified by its VNI). It is used in firewall rule host filters.

InstanceCpuCount.description: The number of CPUs in an Instance

InstanceEnsureBody.description: Sent to a sled agent to establish the runtime state of an Instance

initial.description: Last runtime state of the Instance known to Nexus (used if the agent has never seen this Instance before).

migrate.description: If we're migrating this instance, the details needed to drive the migration

target.description: requested runtime state of the Instance

external_ips.description: Zero or more external IP addresses (either floating or ephemeral), provided to an instance to allow inbound connectivity.

InstanceRuntimeState.description:
Runtime state of the Instance, including the actual running state and minimal metadata

This state is owned by the sled agent running that Instance.

dst_propolis_id.description: the target propolis-server during a migration of this Instance

ncpus.description: number of CPUs allocated for this Instance

propolis_addr.description: address of propolis-server running this Instance

propolis_id.description: which propolis-server is running this Instance

sled_id.description: which sled is running this Instance

InstanceState.description:
Running state of an Instance (primarily: booted or stopped)

This typically reflects whether it's starting, running, stopping, or stopped, but also includes states related to the Instance's lifecycle

oneOf.description: The instance is being created.
The instance is currently starting up.
The instance is currently running.
The instance has been requested to stop and a transition to "Stopped" is imminent.
The instance is currently stopped.
The instance is in the process of rebooting - it will remain in the "rebooting" state until the VM is starting once more.
The instance is in the process of migrating - it will remain in the "migrating" state until the migration process is complete and the destination propolis is ready to continue execution.
The instance is attempting to recover from a failure.
The instance has encountered a failure.
The instance has been deleted.

InstanceStateRequested.description:
Requestable running state of an Instance.

A subset of [`omicron_common::api::external::InstanceState`].

oneOf.description: Start the instance if it is not already running.
Stop the instance.
Issue a reset command to the instance, such that it should stop and then immediately become running.
Stop the instance and delete it.

Ipv4Net.title: An IPv4 subnet
Ipv4Net.description: An IPv4 subnet, including prefix and subnet mask

Ipv6Net.title: An IPv6 subnet
Ipv6Net.description: An IPv6 subnet, including prefix and subnet mask

KnownArtifactKind.description: Kinds of update artifacts, as used by Nexus to determine what updates are available and by sled-agent to determine how to apply an update when asked.

L4PortRange.title: A range of IP ports
L4PortRange.description: An inclusive-inclusive range of IP ports. The second port may be omitted to represent a single port

MacAddr.title: A MAC address
MacAddr.description: A Media Access Control address, in EUI-48 format

Name.title: A name unique within the parent collection
Name.description: Names must begin with a lower case ASCII letter, be composed exclusively of lowercase ASCII, uppercase ASCII, numbers, and '-', and may not end with a '-'. Names cannot be a UUID though they may contain a UUID.

NetworkInterface.description: Information required to construct a virtual network interface for a guest

ServiceEnsureBody.description:
Used to request that the Sled initialize certain services on initialization.

This may be used to record that certain sleds are responsible for launching services which may not be associated with a dataset, such as Nexus.

ServiceZoneRequest.description: Describes a request to create a zone running one or more services.

SetVirtualNetworkInterfaceHost.description: A mapping from a virtual NIC to a physical host

Slot.description: A stable index which is translated by Propolis into a PCI BDF, visible to the guest.

SourceNatConfig.description: An IP address and port range used for instance source NAT, i.e., making outbound network connections from guests.

first_port.description: The first port used for instance NAT, inclusive.

ip.description: The external address provided to the instance

last_port.description: The last port used for instance NAT, also inclusive.

UpdateArtifactId.description: An identifier for a single update artifact.

kind.description: The kind of update artifact this is.

VpcFirewallRule.description: VPC firewall rule after object name resolution has been performed by Nexus

VpcFirewallRuleProtocol.description: The protocols that may be specified in a firewall rule's filter

VpcFirewallRulesEnsureBody.description: Update firewall rules for a VPC

ZoneType.description: The type of zone which may be requested from Sled Agent
